About AWS (Amazon Web Services)

Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a global cloud platform that provides reliable, scalable, and cost-efficient computing infrastructure and services. It powers some of the world’s biggest companies, governments, and startups to deploy applications at scale, with flexibility and security.

Goals and Objectives of AWS
  • To deliver secure, scalable, and cost-effective cloud infrastructure and services.
  • To promote innovation and agility by providing flexible tools and infrastructure.
  • To ensure global scalability, high availability, and resiliency for applications.
  • To support sustainability through green data centers and energy-efficient solutions.
  • To democratize access to advanced technology through services like AI, ML, IoT, and Data Analytics.
